text: The 7 Commission members from the District of Columbia shall be:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., ยง 31-2303.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-65, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 38-2301.

References in Text

The "Committee on Education of the Council of the District of Columbia," referred to in paragraph (3), has been changed to the "Committee on Education and Libraries" by Resolution 7-1 which adopted the Rules Resolution for Council Period VII, effective January 2, 1987.

DC CODE ยง 38-3003

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor of the District of Columbia;
The Chairman of the Council of the District of Columbia;
The Chairperson of the Committee on Education of the Council of the District of Columbia;
The President of the Board of Education of the District of Columbia;
The Superintendent of Schools of the District of Columbia;
The Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the University of the District of Columbia; and
The President of the University of the District of Columbia.

chapter.text: Compact for Education of the Education Commission of the States.
